name: Space Cooking: Violent Wildfire Edition
description:
Make sandwiches for your customers in space as you handle multiple orders, handle angry customers, and manage fires that threaten your kitchen (and your customer's lives!)

Features:

  • 5 increasingly difficult levels
  • 7 different ingredient to mix and match

Themes: 

  • Void Sandwich (making sandwiches in space)
  • Burn it down (intense burn mechanics)

Achievements: 

  • Maverick (team size of 1)
  • One Punch Man (controllable with a single input)
